qualifier: Method getDependencyChain() returns class com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList but the return type is class java.util.List. Make sure that users of this method do not try to modify the collection.

bug_trace.description: Method getDependencyChain() returns class com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList but the return type is class java.util.List. Make sure that users of this method do not try to modify the collection.
